componentDescription: Displays customizable titles with highlighting, responsive sizing, and animation effects.

_isInView.description: Determines if the component is currently visible within the viewport.

children.description: The primary content to be rendered within the Title component.

highlightText.description: Specifies text (or an array of texts) to be highlighted within the title.

alternateHighlightText.description: Provides an array of alternative texts to highlight, potentially used for cycling or conditional rendering.

highlightAnimate.description: Defines animation properties for the highlighted text, supporting single or multiple animations.

highlightTypewriter.description: Enables a typewriter effect animation for the highlighted text.

highlightTypewriterDuration.description: Sets the duration (in milliseconds) for the typewriter animation of the highlighted text.

highlightStyle.description: Applies a predefined style to the highlighted text, such as underline or background.

highlightColor.description: Specifies the primary color for the highlighted text.

highlightSecondaryColor.description: Defines a secondary color for the highlighted text, often used for gradients or alternate states.

animate.description: Applies animation properties to the entire Title component.

animationLoop.description: Determines how many times the component's animation should repeat, or if it should loop infinitely.

highlightAnimationLoop.description: Controls the repetition count for the highlighted text's animation.

size.description: Sets the predefined size of the title (e.g., 'small', 'medium', 'large').

responsive.description: Enables responsive behavior for the title component, adjusting its display based on screen size.

centered.description: Aligns the title text to the center.

views.description: Allows applying custom styles to different view states or parts of the title.

alternateAnimation.description: Activates an alternative animation sequence for the title.

alternateDuration.description: Sets the duration for the alternate animation.
